meaningMnemonic: If you see a <radical>building</radical> wearing a giant <radical>top hat</radical>, beware! This building is a fake and it's trying to <kanji>thwart</kanji> all of the plans the people in other buildings have.
readingMnemonic: The building next door is being painted, and the top hat building is jealous. It <kanji>thwart</kanji>s the painting plans by dumping <reading>so</reading>ap (そ) out of its windows and onto the painters and the building!
